scripts.build: set NODE_ENV=production && tinacms build && next build && echo 'Next.js build complete' && npx pagefind --site out --bundle-dir pagefind --root-selector [data-pagefind-body] --exclude-selectors [role=navigation],nav,aside,header,footer,.navigation,.sidebar,.breadcrumbs --verbose
scripts.build-local: set NODE_ENV=production && next build && echo 'Next.js build complete' && npx pagefind --site out --bundle-dir pagefind --root-selector [data-pagefind-body] --exclude-selectors [role=navigation],nav,aside,header,footer,.navigation,.sidebar,.breadcrumbs --verbose
